data.title: Anna Torv measurements, husband, children and hot photos
data.meta_description: ANNA TORV is a world-renown actress famous for her lead role in Fringe. She is your typical Hollywood girl with a flair for the dramatic, but a queer need for privacy. But we have all the details concerning this actress. Read on
data.text:
When you talk about Australia and the Australian movie scene, Anna Torv will most probably pop up in every conversation. Anna Torv was born on the 7th of June, 1979 in Melbourne Australia to parents Hans Torv and Susan Torv. The talented actress is popularly known for her role in the television series Fringe (2008-2013) as FBI agent Olivia Dunham. Her exemplary performance in Fringe landed her a nomination in the 2011 Critics' Choice Television Award in the category of Best Actress.

Before her breakthrough performance in Fringe Anna Torv had quite an impressive stint in the acting scenes. At the beginning of her acting journey in 1986, she predominantly concentrated on theater until 2002 when she made her first appearance on television playing Nedov in Young Lions. From then on wards, she has built an impressive resume and impression on film lovers by being an extraordinary actress showing fearlessness, determination, and the strength of a woman.

READ ALSO: Jeff Richmond body measurements, marriage to Tina Fey, family

Anna Torv profile summary

Born Name: Anna Torv

Birth Place: Melbourne, Australia

Height: 5 feet 8 inch

Eye Color: Green

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Nationality: Australian

Ethnicity: White

Profession: Actress

Husband: Mark Valley (2008-2009)

Relationship: single

Net Worth: $6 million

Weight: 58 kg.

Age: 40 years

Sibling: Dylan Torv (brother)

Parents: Hans Torv and Susan Torv

Anna Torv biography and career

Anna Torv and his brother Dylan Torv were born to parents Hans Torv and Susan Torv who had a mixed nationality. Her mother was of Scottish descent while her dad had an Estonian descent. Anna and her sibling were born in Melbourne, Victoria but they spend most of their early life in Gold Coast, Queensland.

In the year 1996, she graduated from Benowa State High School and then he later joined Australia’s National Institute of Dramatic Art. She studied art at the institution and in 2001 she graduated with a degree in performing arts. Anna is not the only celebrity figure in her family since her aunt Anna Murdoch Mann was married to Rupert Murdoch for about 30 years. Her cousins James, Lachlan, and Elisabeth Murdoch are successful businessmen and woman and heir to their father Rupert Murdoch’s fortunes. In addition, Lachlan is married to TV presenter, model, and actress Sarah O’Hare.

READ ALSO: Rachel Boston measurements, husband, net worth, hot photos

As stated earlier, she began her career in 1986 acting mostly in theaters until 2002 when she appeared on the television series Young Lions where she played Nedov for about 13 episodes. In the following year, Ophelia in John Bell’s produced film the “Hamlet”. From then on wards she continued appearing in television series and movies such as; The Secret Life of Us as Nikki Martel, Mistresses, Fringe, she is also a voice actor where she recorded a series of audio books and also appeared in ‘Heavenly Sword’ a video game released in 2007 as Nariko.

After taking a short five years break, Anna Torv returned with a bang as she featured in Ryan Murphy's highly anticipated sexuality and relationship drama Open. Her exemplary role in Open as Windsor, a lesbian yoga instructor raised a lot of questions like is Anna Torv lesbian? This was, however, not the case but rather a proof of her exemplary talent to get into character.

Her career achievements and action in front of the camera is proof of how good the actor is. In addition, she has been able to bag a good number of nominations and awards, proving that she has really caught the eyes of many in her acting career. For this reason, it is safe to say that Anna Torv has had a successful career and is regarded as one of the best actresses in her own rights.

Anna Torv awards

For her outstanding performances in a number of films and movies, Anna Torv has had a number of nominations that bagged her five awards as the icing to the cake in her career. All her awards were for her role in Fringe, and it included four Saturn Awards for Best Actress and the other for Teen Choice Award Choice TV Actress.

Anna Torv husband and daughter

Previously married, Anna Torv’s husband was her co-star in Fringe Mark Valley. Anna Torv husband first met her on the Fringe set, and he fell in love. They later got married in December 2008, but unluckily they could not maintain their relationship. The two ended up splitting a year later in 2009.

Anna Torv divorce is believed to have been caused by her relationship with another Fringe star Joshua Jackson. Anna Torv and Joshua Jackson got madly in love making her to divorce her husband, Mark Valley, to be with Josh. This was not the case as Joshua Jackson chickened out, leaving her with an awkward-ever-after relationship.

Anna Torv daughter or son remains unknown as it is not quite clear whether she had children in any of her romantic relationships. She remained single and is among a revolution of actresses in Hollywood who cannot let themselves be defined by men in their lives.

Anna Torv measurements

By looking at her, Anna strikes a lot of people as a beautiful and attractive lady. Anna Torv height is about 5 feet 7 inches while she weighs about 64 kg. In addition, Anna Torv measurements are approximately 35-27-35, which is very impressive for a middle-aged career lady.

Anna Torv net worth

Anna Torv net worth is approximately $6 million. Her wealth mostly comes for her lucrative acting career. It is not known if she has various businesses on the side. However, she makes a good amount of money online from Facebook, Twitter as well as on Instagram. In addition, it is important to note that she also comes from a family of celebrities and business fortunes, which adds to her net worth.

It is safe to say that Anna Torv has really had a successful career as an actress and has set a good example for women in performing arts to be strong, fearless and determined. She is also an inspiration and role model to many that follow her.
